summary: An underground playerhouse with most things people need. Close to Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod: feedback appreciated, might be buggy and weird.

Located on the other side of the river from Riverwood, a small camp with an entrance to the underground home. Mapmarker available (\"coc SecretHideout\" for the lazy)

Contains an Alchemist table, Enchanters table, 3 Mannequins, 1 Displaycase, 6 Weaponracks, 4 Weaponplaques, Smelter, Forge, Armorbench, Grindstone, Tanningrack, Cookingpot and barrels and chests that \"should\" be safe storage.

TODO:
Bookshelf (as soon as I figure out how they work)
author: Irdantur
